name: Vitale #21
description: Your 1.04 carat Fancy Brownish Reddish Orange diamond is rare, with a captivating and distinctive combination of hues. The orange and brown shades of your diamond attest the presence of nitrogen atoms that absorb blue light and create an warm tint, combined with red luminescence. Like an intense burning flame, the blend of brown, red, and orange hues in your diamond may symbolise warmth, passion, and earthy elegance.
